name: Mngwa
languages: Common, Sylvan, can speak with felines

trait.name: Keen Smell
text: The mngwa has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
text: The mngwa has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the mngwa's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Running Leap
text: With a 10-foot running start, the mngwa can long jump up to 25 feet.

trait.name: Feline Empathy
text: The mngwa has advantage on Wisdom (Animal Handling) checks to deal with felines.

trait.name: Ethereal Coat
text: The armor class of the mngwa includes its Charisma modifier. All attack rolls against the mngwa have disadvantage. If the mngwa is adjacent to an area of smoke or mist, it can take a Hide action even if under direct observation.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The mngwa makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.
